text: On the Riviera is a 1951 American musical comedy movie directed by Walter Lang and is the third adaption of the same story. It stars Danny Kaye, Gene Tierney, Corinne Calvert, Marcel Dalio, Jean Murat, Henri Letondal, Sig Ruman and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for Academy Awards in 1952. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:1951 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Walter Lang
title: On the Riviera
